description: Angular component for displaying detailed information about a recipe, including loading recipe data based on route parameters, error handling, navigation, and utility functions for UI.

classes.name: RecipeDetailComponent
classes.description: Angular component that manages recipe detail view, handles data loading, user interactions, and error states.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that initiates recipe loading when component is initialized.

methods.name: ngOnDestroy
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that cleans up subscriptions when component is destroyed.

methods.name: loadRecipe
methods.description: Fetches recipe data based on route parameters and handles success or failure.

methods.name: goBack
methods.description: Navigates back to the recipe list.

methods.name: getDifficultyColor
methods.description: Returns a CSS class based on the recipe's difficulty level.

methods.name: getTotalTime
methods.description: Calculates total cooking time including prep and cook time.

methods.name: onImageError
methods.description: Handles image load error by substituting a placeholder image.
